Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.jboss.aerogear.android.authentication.AuthenticationModule.getAuthorizationFields()
    This method has been superseded by AuthenticationModule.getAuthorizationFields(java.net.URI, String, byte[])
    org.jboss.aerogear.android.impl.pipeline.PipeConfig.getDataRoot()
    use MarshallingConfig.getDataRoot() instead
    org.jboss.aerogear.android.impl.pipeline.PipeConfig.getEncoding()
    Use MarshallingConfig.getEncoding() instead
    org.jboss.aerogear.android.impl.pipeline.GsonRequestBuilder.getGson()
    This method exists to support another deprecated method while we transition off of it. PipeConfig.setGsonBuilder(com.google.gson.GsonBuilder)
    org.jboss.aerogear.android.impl.pipeline.GsonResponseParser.getGson()
    This method exists to support another deprecated method while we transition off of it. PipeConfig.setGsonBuilder(com.google.gson.GsonBuilder)
    org.jboss.aerogear.android.pipeline.Pipe.getGson()
    org.jboss.aerogear.android.impl.pipeline.PipeConfig.getGsonBuilder()
    Pipes are moving to a more generic RequestBuilder interface. GsonRequestBuilder
    org.jboss.aerogear.android.pipeline.ResponseParser.handleArrayResponse(String, Class)
    use ResponseParser.handleResponse(org.jboss.aerogear.android.http.HeaderAndBody, java.lang.Class) instead
    org.jboss.aerogear.android.pipeline.ResponseParser.handleResponse(String, Class)
    use ResponseParser.handleResponse(org.jboss.aerogear.android.http.HeaderAndBody, java.lang.Class) instead
    org.jboss.aerogear.android.pipeline.PipeHandler.onRead(Pipe)
    org.jboss.aerogear.android.pipeline.PipeHandler.onReadWithFilter(ReadFilter, Pipe)
    org.jboss.aerogear.android.pipeline.PipeHandler.onSave(T)
    org.jboss.aerogear.android.pipeline.Pipe.readWithFilter(ReadFilter, Callback>)
    in 1.1. Please use Pipe.read(org.jboss.aerogear.android.ReadFilter, org.jboss.aerogear.android.Callback) instead
    org.jboss.aerogear.android.impl.pipeline.PipeConfig.setDataRoot(String)
    use MarshallingConfig.setDataRoot(java.lang.String) instead
    org.jboss.aerogear.android.impl.pipeline.PipeConfig.setEncoding(Charset)
    Use MarshallingConfig.setEncoding(java.nio.charset.Charset)} instead
    org.jboss.aerogear.android.impl.pipeline.PipeConfig.setEncoding(String)
    Use MarshallingConfig.setEncoding(java.nio.charset.Charset)} instead
    org.jboss.aerogear.android.impl.pipeline.GsonRequestBuilder.setGson(Gson)
    This method exists to support another deprecated method while we transition off of it. PipeConfig.setGsonBuilder(com.google.gson.GsonBuilder)
    org.jboss.aerogear.android.impl.pipeline.GsonResponseParser.setGson(Gson)
    This method exists to support another deprecated method while we transition off of it. PipeConfig.setGsonBuilder(com.google.gson.GsonBuilder)
    org.jboss.aerogear.android.impl.pipeline.PipeConfig.setGsonBuilder(GsonBuilder)
    Pipes are moving to a more generic RequestBuilder interface. GsonRequestBuilder
    org.jboss.aerogear.android.impl.datamanager.StoreConfig.setKlass(Class)
    please use StoreConfig#Class instead.
    org.jboss.aerogear.android.DataManager.store(String)
    use DataManager.store(java.lang.String, java.lang.Class)
